name: Talis Dirigentes
description:
Your gun is bound to the die! Roll to reload your gun! Collect coins dropped by enemies to level up! Upgrade your weapon with additional abilities. How long can you last against unending hordes of enemies, while keeping the dice rolling?

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys - Move

Z/Space - Jump

X/K - Shoot

Made by Bartłomiej Płókarz for GMTK Game Jam 2022.
